original: intros n t l H. induction H using height_pred_ind. - exists (n :: nil). apply height_pred_nil. - specialize (IHheight_pred1 ltac:(auto)). specialize (IHheight_pred2 ltac:(auto)). destruct IHheight_pred1 as [ln1 H1]. destruct IHheight_pred2 as [ln2 H2]. exists (ln1 ++ ln2). apply height_pred_node. + apply H1. + apply H1. + apply H2. + apply H2.
